channel.title: Maddie Peterson's Github Site
channel.description: Recent content on Maddie Peterson's Github Site

item.title: About Maddie Peterson
item.description: As a sophomore majoring in Sports Media and Communication and Advertising and Public Relations at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln, I’ve learned that there is a wide variety of opportunities within those industries. From public speaking, to coding, to creating campaigns, to making videos– I have been able to dip my toes into just about every area throughout my college experience thus far. I also have continued to seek out real-world experiences through jobs and internships that have helped me continuously learn and gain experience.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.
